entry.title: FriSt PS0t!
entry.summary:
Welcome! I am using Pelican to write this website. I want to use these pages to tell a few stories about my work and scientific stuff I am interested in. With no particular order, I would like to write about bioinformatics (and biology in general), machine learning (yes, here I include big data and data science) and statistics, and eventually, computer science.

By the way, the title is an old meme.

Oh I forgot, I can use LaTeX as well!: $$P(A|B) = P(A)\frac{P(B|A)}{P(B)}.$$
